markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clever Improviser](/Feats.aspx?ID=74) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 57 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You’ve learned how to handle situations when you’re out of your depth. You gain the [Untrained Improvisation](/Feats.aspx?ID=861) general feat. In addition, you can attempt skill actions that normally require you to be trained, even if you are untrained.

<title level="2">Clever Improviser leads to...</title>
[Incredible Improvisation](/Feats.aspx?ID=76)
name: Clever Improviser
